title: MCP tool integration layer
description: VSM currently has no tool integrations beyond email and filesystem. OpenClaw ships 100+ integrations (GitHub, Slack, Google Workspace, databases). VSM should leverage Model Context Protocol (MCP) to add tool integrations without custom API wrappers. Priority targets: GitHub (issues, PRs, repo management), calendar, and web browsing.
